name: Slize
description:
Slize!

This little slime has a little bit more up its sleeve than you think. Jump, dip, duck, weave through traps and obstacles in this platformer and win! 
Controls:
[A]           - Left
[D]          - Right
[Space] - Jump
[QER]    - Change Sizes
